Episodes.Title: The Emperor's Peace
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Gaal Dornick leaves her life at Synnax behind when the galaxy's greatest mathematician, Hari Seldon, invites her to Trantor.

Episodes.Title: Preparing to Live
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: The Foundation makes the long journey to Terminus as Gaal and Raych grow closer. The Empire faces a difficult decision.

Episodes.Title: The Mathematician's Ghost
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Lee Pace, Lou Llobell, Leah Harvey
Episodes.Plot: Brother Dusk reflects on his legacy as he prepares for ascension. The Foundation arrives on Terminus and finds a mysterious object.

Episodes.Title: Barbarians at the Gate
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Salvor faces off with an enemy of the Empire. Brothers Day and Dusk are at odds, while Brother Dawn wrestles with his truth.

Episodes.Title: Upon Awakening
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lou Llobell, Leah Harvey
Episodes.Plot: A flashback reveals the origins of Gaal's conflict between faith and science. The standoff on Terminus takes an unfortunate turn.

Episodes.Title: Death and the Maiden
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Brother Day meets Zephyr Halima-a would-be leader who opposes the Empire. Brother Dusk grows suspicious of Brother Dawn.

Episodes.Title: Mysteries and Martyrs
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: The Anacreons and their hostages board the fabled Invictus warship. The bond between Brother Dawn and Azura intensifies.

Episodes.Title: The Missing Piece
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Brother Day embarks on a journey no other Cleon has ever attempted. Salvor prepares to make the ultimate sacrifice to return home.

Episodes.Title: The First Crisis
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: On Terminus, Salvor witnesses how powerful the null field has become. Brother Dawn makes a daring choice.

Episodes.Title: The Leap
Episodes.Writer: David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman, Isaac Asimov
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: An unexpected ally helps Salvor broker an alliance. A confrontation between the Brothers leads to unthinkable consequences.
